metadata.title: CVE-2023-0645 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read exists in libjxl. An attacker using a specificallycrafted file could cause an out of bounds read in the exif handler. Werecommend upgrading to version 0.8.1 or past commithttps://github.com/libjxl/libjxl/pull/2101/commits/d95b050c1822a5b1ede9e0dc937e43fca1b10159https://github.com/libjxl/libjxl/pull/2101/commits/d95b050c1822a5b1ede9e0dc937e43fca1b10159

criterions.comment: jpeg-xl package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
